Description:
A Well Rounded Investment!
Set within a young and manicured complex, this well-appointed townhouse will make an exemplary investment! A generous floorplan delivers a tiled entrance and carpeted front lounge room, and then a wide hallway leads through to a large, second open plan living zone. Practically equipped with tiled flooring there's room for relaxation and meals, plus a modern kitchen with stylish dark cabinetry, dishwasher and great cupboard space. A partially covered, north facing entertaining area is easily accessed through glass sliding doors off the living zone, the perfect space to enjoy breakfast, lunch or dinner outside and then a cute yard provides room for a spot of gardening and playing. A family sized bathroom services two robed bedrooms, while the master comes with an attractive ensuite and walk-in robe. There's gas ducted heating and evaporative cooling, timber venetians, internal access to the double lockup garage and great cupboard storage. This one ticks all the boxes, including a fabulous location that's within close proximity to schools, shops, transport, parks and reserves. Offering a low maintenance, perfectly maintained and presented investment package, this one will be snapped up quick smart. Be quick to arrange your inspection today.
Geoff Thompson

BIGGER, BETTER, BEST

Such sleek easy flowing style, latest light toned floor tiles and quality fittings provides this sensational front townhouse of 4 so generously spaced in the leafy setting with all you need for comfortable living.

Description:
Great Home In A Quiet Court Location!
Delightfully positioned at the bottom of a family friendly and safe court, this home sits in a luscious green pocket close to schools, parks, reserves, shops, and there's even a bus stop at the end of the street. This impressive 1008m2 (approx) block, houses an equally impressive home that would really suit all buyers. You might be looking for a high quality first home, and with this land size you would even have the opportunity to explore extending (STCA) at some stage. Or perhaps you are an empty nester looking for a quiet location and fabulous home, or even an investor looking for an opportunity to secure an easy money earner in a great location. Boasting two living zones, and with gas ducted heating throughout, the home opens to a separate light-filled lounge room that then steps through to a radiant designer kitchen and meals zone equipped with rich polished timber flooring and split system cooling. Truly flawless and with no expense spared, the stunning kitchen is completed with Caeser stone benchtop, bountiful cupboards and soft close drawers, glass splash back, stainless steel appliances including dish drawer dishwasher and Smeg oven and induction cooktop. A lovely window and glass double doors provide natural light and provides access to a raised covered deck, perfect for outdoor entertaining and a lovely spot to sit and look over a rear yard that offers so much room to run and play, two veggie patches and a vista of lush green surrounds. Bedrooms come threefold, two are robed and all are serviced by a central bathroom with bath-tub. An under house area and an enormous double car garage with remote controlled door and lighting provides room for ample storage and a water tank with pump and taps means easy maintenance for the landscaped front yard and established roses. Offering a serene environment for the family, this ideal home is sure to be cherished by its lucky new owner! Be quick to make your enquiry today.
Carl Payne : 0413 589 800

Description:
Great Value, Great Living, Great Investment
Modern and spacious, this three bedroom unit offers great value for first homebuyers and investors. Featuring a bright interior and spacious living zone, this beautiful home comprises a first floor with large lounge room, an airy meals zone that's drenched in natural light, and a feature filled kitchen that boasts generous bench and cupboard space. Providing a fantastic atmosphere to enjoy the outdoors and the upcoming Spring and Summer, the home opens out from the meals zone straight to a covered deck and low maintenance yard. Upstairs, an appealing and well-executed floorplan sees three robed bedrooms branch off from an open hallway with a central, stylish and family sized bathroom also acting as an ensuite to the master. Ensuring maximum comfort with gas ducted heating, plus split system cooling for the warmer months, downstairs powder room and handy internal access from a double lock up garage. Set within an attractive and young complex, surrounded by magnificent open parkland with walking tracks, this home is within walking distance to schools, shops, public transport, parks and reserves. Make an offer, this solid investment or first home is a comprehensive package that's sure to delight!
Carl Payne : 0413 589 800

Description:
The Beauty and Bliss of Low Maintenance
Providing the perfect combination of low maintenance and spacious living, this modern unit features a lovely street frontage complete with picket fence, cute front garden and private driveway. Consisting of a welcoming, wide entrance with liberal coat cupboard, the home steps into a spacious and bright lounge room revealing the first of two living areas. From there, the family room and meals zone opens up, providing great floor space, and connecting beautifully with a spotless kitchen, equipped with stainless steel appliances and gas cooktop. The homes two bedrooms are airy and robed, and a luxuriously large bathroom acts as an ensuite to the master. With everything stylish and in pristine condition, there's new carpet throughout, gas ducted heating, split system cooling, a pet door, and then a liberal rear deck that's private and protected, and plenty big enough to host summer BBQ's. With a few pots of herbs and an outdoor lounge suite, this low maintenance haven will provide pure relaxation, while interior and exterior access to the double lock-up garage offers practicality. With the bus stop nearly at the front door, and shops and amenities close by, this immaculately presented unit will please retirees, first-homebuyers and executive couples. Book your inspection today!
James Brougham : 0412 620 498

Description:
Practical, Pretty, Private.....PERFECT!
Set within picturesque surrounds on a charming street full of classy homes and pretty gardens, this three bedroom home will make the perfect first home or quality investment. A well-executed, split level design enhances a unique position and features luxuriously high ceilings and a pleasant outlook from all rooms. Opening to a sundrenched entrance, to one side of the hallway the master bedroom features generous robes and an ensuite. Back on the landing, the family bathroom is unblemished and practical, and up a short staircase the second bedroom is adequately robed. The third bedroom also offers ample robes, air conditioning, and a uniquely large space that would allow for either accommodating multiple children, or perhaps combining the bedroom with a study or playroom. Travelling back down the stairs, the living zone reveals a roomy and open lounge room that sweeps around to lovely meals area that looks across to the spotless kitchen. Blessed with floor to ceiling windows that extend across the back of the home, a stunning outlook includes a covered deck with ample space to enjoy the great outdoors, and extends to the expansive rear yard and on to beautiful tree tops and lush green surrounds. Providing an air of quietness and privacy, the beautifully maintained gardens include cottage plants and established ferns, while good fencing ensures security. Practical, pretty and within close proximity to schools, shops and transport, plus gas ducted heating, cooling to the living zone and a double garage, ensure this home covers all bases!
Maree Slade : 0419 519 282
Insights: 1/6-8 Faull Close, CROYDON NORTH VIC 3136 was last sold in 2019 and 16 other 3 bedroom unit in CROYDON NORTH have recently been sold.

Description:
EXECUTORS ESTATE AUCTION - Here's a Smart Unit
This smart one owner brick veneer unit won't having you feel cramped because it boasts two big separate living areas! The lovely tree-lined street and the secluded landscaped setting at the rear of only three, makes this stylish, light-filled unit a find for First Homebuyers, Young Families, Investors or Retirees. Enjoy easy living close to transport, shops and EastLink. Discover a large, well-equipped open plan kitchen featuring quality gas cooking appliances, dishwasher and double pantry. Flowing out for casual living is a big tiled family/meals area with built-in storage and doors to the garden. The stylish lounge room gives you another separate space to entertain or unwind. Two bedrooms (fitted BIRs) are serviced by a sparkling walk-thru bathroom. Styled with modern window furnishings and neutral tones, it's all beautifully presented and easy to live in or rent out now. Outdoors you'll be able to relax in the good-sized, low-maintenance & secure landscaped garden. It's very private and has a vegie patch and storage area for your garden tools. Finished with quality appointments: secure internal access double lock-up garage, great storage, ducted heating and cooling. In a prime location, near bus, Luther College, Warrien reserve and shops. Don't miss it!
* Photo ID required for all Open Home Inspections

Description:
ENJOY RELAXED RUSTIC LIVING
Feel relaxed and seduced by the rich appeal and easy flowing split level design highlighted with rustic bricks and beams in this large contemporary family home. Love the ambient open fire and Coonara, the striking new country style gourmet kitchen with huge walk in pantry, the two generous living rooms and separate dining. Three bedrooms with study/office WITH private/separate access. Timber and tile flooring, the instant comfort of ducted heating and cooling, a corner spa in the modern family bathroom and designer ensuite, you’ll love it. Sitting on a deep approx 1039 m2 with steel double garage and a bistro blind protected deck to entertain on, it ticks every box.

Description:
GOLD!! You'll think you've hit the jackpot!
Sit back, relax & put one's feet up: that's all you will have to do when you become the proud new owner of this home reminiscent of a Miner's Cottage. Painstakingly renovated and modernised throughout. You name it: it's either been replaced, repaired, reworked or renewed, top to toe! Liberal floor plan comprising three (3) spacious bedrooms, functional living, fully equipped kitchen, meals, stylish bathroom including 2nd toilet and Euro laundry. Outdoors: Year-round entertaining / alternate 2nd living (with a little lateral thinking), secure covered car accommodation plus extra 2nd vehicle parking. Watch the world go by while you sip a morning cuppa / cool drink on the front verandah overlooking a secure fenced pet- and child- friendly landscaped cottage garden. Of course, quality appointments plus more. An inspection will be a delight.

Description:
MULTIPLYING DEVELOPMENT OPPORTUNITY
Astute developers will get excited by the genuine prime location close to Croydon North shops as well as the fantastic wide and level 1126m2 that offers potential as a multiple unit development site (STCA). The comfortable original 3 bedroom weatherboard home with its double garage is as neat as a pin and can earn its keep with rent returns. Its gas heated lounge dining room opens to a covered deck, the tidy kitchen has been updated and bedrooms all have built in robes. There's also a separate shower room plus evaporative cooling. And the promise of a great rewarding future is what impresses most of all.

Description:
The Wow Factor
Showcasing outstanding open living, this dual level home boasts effortless style ideal for the entertainer. Polished boards merge with a neutral colour palette and abundant natural light. The open dining, reclining and entertaining domain is overlooked by a stunning yet functional kitchen equipped with stainless-steel appliances and stone counter tops. Sliding doors access a deck and landscaped yard. Allocated to the upper floor, the sleeping quarters comprise spacious bedrooms equipped with mirrored built-in robes and the service of a modern bathroom (master with bright ensuite). Made for both formal occasions and daily life, this marvellously modern home is within walking distance to Exeter Road shops, buses (to Eastland and Chirnside Park), and schools. Further features include: GDH, water tank, garden shed, internal access to the remote-controlled garage, European laundry and a powder room.

Description:
Split-Level Splendour
An accommodating residence, this spacious split-level home is bound to impress. Offset by tall ceilings and tastefully subdued tones, the logical layout caters for both casual and formal living requirements. A sumptuous formal lounge, warmed by an open fireplace, leads to a formal dining room. From here, sliding doors reveal a well-appointed kitchen with views over the meals domain, as well as the family room equipped with built-in wall unit. A covered pergola with a built-in barbeque provides for alfresco soirees. The sleeping quarters are distributed for privacy. Three large bedrooms benefit from built-in robes and a bathroom with a spa bath. A whole floor is dedicated to the master suite, a luxurious space serviced by a walk-in robe and ensuite. Set up high, the home enjoys tree-top and mountain views and is in easy reach of modern amenities including renowned schools (such as Village School, Yarra Valley Grammar and Oxley College), shops and transport. Features: intercom system, gas ducted heating, and air-conditioning.

Description:
Live Two Separate Lives
With a magical sense of seclusion, this expansive residence is ideal for a large family or dual living. Showcasing free-flowing living and entertainment spaces, the home boasts a covered deck privy to tree-top views over a bush reserve. The entry level opens into a sumptuous sunken lounge and adjacent dining area which progresses to the well-equipped kitchen overseen by a casual meals/family area. This floor also includes four bedrooms with built-in robes – the master with walk-in robe and ensuite, serviced by a bright bathroom. Downstairs, a self-contained space possesses its own external access, large bedroom, living area, kitchen and bathroom. Situated in a quiet court in a family friendly locale, the home is in easy reach of schools such as Croydon Secondary College, Yarra Valley Grammar and Good Shepherd Primary School. Features: gas ducted heating, cooling, ducted vacuum and double garage.

Description:
Under Offer/Under Contract
This brilliantly elevated family brick home is perched on the high side of the road of a much sought after location, perfectly framing the beautiful view to the Dandenong Ranges from the large lounge/dining room and front deck. It's a home that delivers fabulous features from the moment you step inside, with polished hardwood floors, ducted heating and air conditioning to two separate living areas, including a light filled modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances with adjoining meals area and immaculate paintwork throughout. Wake up to lovely garden views from a large master bedroom with BIR and ensuite, two other bedrooms with BIR are serviced by a modern bathroom, laundry and separate family room that looks out to rear pergola. Below is a remote control double garage with rear under house storage all nestled on approx 924m2 of land with perfectly maintained rear gardens backing onto local fauna reserve. All this within close proximity to Nth Croydon shops, transport and with an array of both public and private schools in the area. You won't want to miss this beautifully presented home.

Description:
Comfy family living or renovate and reap the rewards
POSSIBLE 3 UNIT SITE (STCA)
This 3 bedroom family home offers numerous features that will make first home buyers, growing families and even investors satisfied, starting with the quiet court location where kids are free to play, and the handy position, close to bus services, shops and schools. Past the cactus landscaped gardens, inside provides all the essentials for easy living, including a spacious lounge/diner with reverse cycle AC and French doors leading to the covered patio out the back, meanwhile the kitchen/meals ensures plenty of usable space and comforting features like a dishwasher, electric cooking facilities and an outlook to the back yard. The bedrooms and spa bathroom are privately zoned down the hall and offer ample space and light, as well as built in wardrobes. Evaporative cooling, ducted heating, feature parquetry floors in the walk ways and a large laundry is just an example of what to expect inside, while outside provides a large single garage, garden shed and a secured in-ground swimming pool.

Description:
Your Future Looks Bright - 848 sqm. (approx.)
If you're a Young Family, Starter, Investor or Renovator you must see this superbly located brick veneer family home. It's set on a large and level block of 848 sqm. (approx.), and is close to Luther College, Primary schools, shops and transport. The tree-lined street and established gardens create a peaceful vibe. Offering you a comfortable lifestyle or investment now, the light interior gives you scope to further modernise or add your own creative touches if you wish. The spacious and functional floorplan delivers two separate living areas for easy living. Discover a large L' shaped lounge/dining room, and a good-sized family/meals area with doors out to the alfresco deck. The open plan kitchen features a dishwasher, electric oven and gas cooktop. You'll find 3 double bedrooms, along with a central bathroom and separate toilet. Plus a privately-zoned master with ensuite and WIR. Entertain all year round on the big covered entertainer's deck, while the children play in the huge garden. Extras: gas ducted heating, 2 air-conditioners, storage shed and 3-car accommodation comprising double lock-up garage and single carport. Act now to secure your bright future!
